title: Input-Output Model
overview: This course provides professional knowledge for the Economics and Mathematics specialization. It equips students with basic knowledge about the Input-Output model and its analysis in economics. The course uses Excel to practice with real data, aiming for practical application so that students can analyze and forecast demand for resources in the economy based on different scenarios.

skill_outcomes.outcome_description: Students will be able to understand and apply the Input-Output model using Excel.
Students will be able to analyze economic data and make predictions based on different scenarios.
